extendedInfo.description: Description: --------------------------------- Get the latest news and information about New York Institute of Technology (NYIT). Features: --------------------------------- Get Social: Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube keep you up to date on NYIT achievements and news. Events: Catch all the activities offered by the university and its nearly 50 student clubs and organizations. My NYIT: NYIT students get quick access to their NYITConnect profiles, schedules, and grades. Admissions: Interested in attending NYIT? Fill out the online âApply Nowâ form from your mobile device. NYIT Plus: Fun add-ons for your entertainment.**NEW**Campus Map brought to you by NYIT Staff and Students:- Michael Madigan, Staff - Ziqian Dong, Faculty - Pradeep Murugulla, Student - Abhishek Vemani, Student

reviews.title: Should try
reviews.comment: Nice try but my nyit is same as in your browser which is not cool at all. Waiting for a nice app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: This should also have the manhattan campus map,also needs to campus events without going on the web and to login for \"mynyit\" should be portable
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: \"My NYIT\" login is just your web browser on NYIT\'s website. I already had that bookmarked so this app is useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why is there a dancing bear as part of the app? Poor choice... I think there is a lot of room for improvement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be MUCH better if it gave us access to log into the school wifi...kinda useless without that!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Abandoned by an overpriced College. So overpriced It pretended that it couldn\'t afford to keep this crap updated.\tAn app like this shouldn\'t have to use a browser to view news and updates, yup a College I used to go to uses this app to spy on you GPS permissions. Really? It\'s June 13, 2013 Last Update August 19, 2011. Abandonware.
reviews.author: A Google User
